summary: A man falls in love with a beautiful woman, but later discovers that her brothers are gangsters.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Katrina Kaif|Nana Patekar|Anil Kapoor|Paresh Rawal|Supriya Karnik|Feroz Khan|Mallika Sherawat|Sanjay Mishra|Sherveer Vakil|Asrani|Paresh Ganatra|Adi Irani|Mushtaq Khan|Malaika Arora|Snehal Dabi|Shabnam Kapoor|Om Puri|Vijay Raaz|Ranjeet|Sharad Sankla|Rajeev Saxena|Sunil Shetty|Swantatra Bharat|Harry Josh|Ekram Kashmiri|Christina Sampson
title: Welcome
